text: Fig. 9.2 Prologue for the LABEL f Label for function entry point header f(P1,… Pw) using— pyi=M[SP+8] Load parameters into variables the frame layout shown in Fig. 9.1 Pn = M[SP+8%m] SP := SP framesize; Make room for local variables Fig. 93 Epilogue for the SP:= SP+ framesize; Free space for local variables instruction RETURN resul!—— MSP 48] := result Store result on stack using the frame layout GOTO MISP) Return to caller shown in Fig. 9.1
